thread.title: mayalice
thread.title_full: LilySilk Bedding Store reviewed by mayalice

author: mayalice
title: mayalice
text:
I was excited to finally order these after thinking about it for too long. I am thrilled with the quality of these pillowcases. The hidden zipper is very nice and I know it will last. My hair always looks nice when I first wash it but by the next say it is already getting frizzy. I see such a difference in my hair now! It stays smoother, longer. Still waiting for the pillowcase to remove my wrinkles ,;)
It feels great to sleep on and arrived promptly.
